quests.desc: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to unlock the formless locker. After that, open the formless locker. After that, retrieve the type 9 key from the formless locker. If you can get your hands on the type 9 key, unlock the type 9 gate in the vault. And then, ensure that the type 9 gate inside the vault is open. And then, move south. Once you do that, try to take a trip south. And then, travel east. Okay, and then, head north. And then, lift the fly larva from the floor of the restroom. That's it!
commands: unlock formless locker with formless latchkey
take type 9 key from formless locker
unlock type 9 gate with type 9 key
unlock formless locker with formless latchkey
take type 9 key from formless locker
unlock type 9 gate with type 9 key

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a restroom.

 You see a safe. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The safe is empty![end if] Look over there! a trunk.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. A normal kind of place.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 9 gate leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You're now in the attic.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a counter. The counter is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_0]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You smell an awful smell, and follow it to a stand. The stand is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_1]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a vault.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The formless locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The formless locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a workbench. The workbench is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 9 gate leading south.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookhouse. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out a case.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The case contains [a list of things in the c_3]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The case is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You have come into the most usual of all possible steam rooms. You begin to take stock of what's here.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're now in a studio. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display in the room.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The display contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bathroom. A normal one.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling an office.

 You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a locker.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Look over there! a desk. The desk is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the desk you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] The desk appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the garage.

 You see a rack. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]However, the rack, like an empty rack, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so typical all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the shower.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a board. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A typical kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a launderette. A typical kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can make out a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_6] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] The shelf appears to be empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the shelf.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a closet.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a suitcase.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedroom. An usual kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You're now in a laundromat.

 You see a bench. The bench is normal.[if there is something on the s_7] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You move on, clearly infuriated by your TextWorld experience.[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_8]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cubicle.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a cabinet.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

You've entered a kitchenette.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a plate. The plate is typical.[if there is something on the s_9] On the plate you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a chair. [if there is something on the s_10]On the chair you see [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

walkthrough: unlock formless locker with formless latchkey
take type 9 key from formless locker
unlock type 9 gate with type 9 key

objective: Welcome to another fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, assure that the formless locker is unlocked. After unlocking the formless locker, ensure that the formless locker is open. And then, recover the type 9 key from the formless locker inside the vault. And then, unlock the type 9 gate. Then, open the type 9 gate inside the vault. Then, make an effort to take a trip south. And then, try to venture south. Okay, and then, take a trip east. If you can do that, attempt to move north. And then, pick up the fly larva from the floor of the restroom. That's it!
